reference: Vickers, John, Inflation Targeting in Practice: The U.K. Experience, Bank of England Quarterly Bulletin, November 1998.

Levin, Andrew, Volker Wieland, and John C. Williams, The Performance of Forecast- Based Monetary Policy Rules, unpublished, Federal Reserve Board, 2001.
Giannoni, Marc P., Robust Optimal Monetary Policy in a Forward-Looking Model with Parameter and Shock Uncertainty, unpublished, Princeton University, 2001.
Hansen, Lars P., and Thomas J. Sargent, Robust Control and Filtering of Forward- Looking Models, unpublished, University of Chicago, October 2000.
Batini, Nicoletta, and Joe Pearlman, Too Much Too Soon: Instability and Indetermi- nacy with Forward-Looking Rules, unpublished, Bank of England, July 2002.
Black, Richard, Tiff Macklem, and David Rose, On Policy Rules for Price Stability, in T. Macklem, ed., Price Stability, Inflation Targets and Monetary Policy, Ottawa: Bank of Canada, 1997.
